title: On-Site Courtesy Patrol, Vanity, Ceiling Fans
posting_body: ['Evoq Apartments encompasses the best of the Las Vegas Strip all in one convenient, modern, and central location.', 'Enjoy a storied neighborhood, engaging culture, and unique living accommodations in an unbeatable location just a block from the most luxurious Hotels and Casinos in the World.', '-Grey Subway Tile Kitchen Backsplashes', '-Business Center with Complimentary WiFi, Computers, and Brainstorming Room', '-Well Beats Personal Fitness Classes', '-Elevators', '-Marbled Tile Bath Enclosures', '-Stainless Steel Multi-Cycle Dishwasher', '-Controlled Access Gates', '-Fitness Center with Cardio & Free Weights', '-Glossy', 'Two Toned Grey / White Flat Panel Cabinetry', '-Air Conditioning', '-Wet Bar', '-Three Resort-Style Pools, Including Spa, Cabanas, and Fire Pit', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
